title: TNPSC Financial Officer Exam: 3 Candidates from Manithaneyam Training Center Succeed
excerpt: In the TNPSC conducted Financial Officer post exam, 3 people who studied at Saidai Duraisamy Manithaneyam training center succeeded. V. Manikandan secured 1st rank, A. Kishore secured 3rd rank, and Ajith Kumar secured 4th rank at state level.

title: Indian Forest Service Exam Results: 3 Candidates from Manithaneyam Succeed
excerpt: 143 candidates selected nationwide. J.P. Bisha secured 88th rank at All India level. P. Blessy Sreejil (110th rank) and P. Arun Srinivas (125th rank) from Chennai also succeeded after training at Manithaneyam.

title: 22 Lawyers Pass Assistant Public Prosecutor Exam After Manithaneyam Training
excerpt: 22 lawyers who received training at the Manithaneyam IAS Free Education Academy have successfully passed the preliminary examination for Assistant Public Prosecutor Grade-2.

title: UPSC Civil Services Main Exam: Free Lunch Provided to Candidates
excerpt: Free lunch was provided to UPSC Main Exam candidates on behalf of Manithaneyam Charitable Trust Chairman Saidai Duraisamy. The exam is being held for 5 days.

title: Group-1 State Level First Rank: K. Kathirselvi from Manithaneyam
excerpt: K. Kathirselvi from Cuddalore district, who studied at Manithaneyam Coaching Centre, secured the state-level first rank in the Group-1 examination conducted by TNPSC.

title: Group-1 Candidates Receive Educational Assistance from Manithaneyam
excerpt: 525 or more Group-1 primary exam candidates received a scholarship of 10,000 rupees each. The aid was distributed by Saidai Duraisamy and former DGP Alexander.

title: CAPF Assistant Commandant Exam: 8 Candidates from Manithaneyam Succeed
excerpt: 8 candidates who trained at Saidai Duraisamy's Manithaneyam training center successfully cleared the exam. Aravind Aishwaryankutty from Kerala secured 69th rank nationally.

title: Group-1, 1A Preliminary Exam Results: 67 Candidates from Manithaneyam Succeed
excerpt: 67 people who studied at Manithaneyam Coaching Center passed the preliminary exam and are eligible for the main exam. 37 women and 30 men succeeded.

title: UPSC Candidates Receive Food Assistance from Manithaneyam
excerpt: Free lunch was provided to students participating in the UPSC Main Exam by former Chennai Mayor Saidai Duraisamy's Manithaneyam Free IAS Academy.

title: UPSC Civil Services Preliminary Exam: 71 Candidates from Manithaneyam Succeed
excerpt: 71 candidates who studied at Saidai Duraisamy's Manithaneyam Centre succeeded in the Civil Services Preliminary Exam. 57 men and 14 women cleared the exam.

title: 31 Civil Services Appointments: Including 9 IAS Posts from Manithaneyam
excerpt: 31 individuals have been appointed to civil service positions, including 9 IAS, 1 IFS, 2 IPS, 9 IRS, and other services after training at Manithaneyam Training Centre.

title: Civil Services Interview Results: 35 Candidates from Manithaneyam Succeed
excerpt: 35 people who studied at Saidai Duraisamy's Manithaneyam Centre succeeded in the Civil Services interview. 23 men and 12 women were successful.

title: Government Assistant Criminal Lawyer Exam: 22 Candidates from Manithaneyam Succeed
excerpt: 22 individuals who trained with the Tamil Nadu and Puducherry Bar Council and Manithaneyam IAS Free Education Institute for the Government Assistant Criminal Lawyer Grade-2 main exam have succeeded.

title: Group-1 Main Exam: Educational Assistance for 525 Candidates
excerpt: Educational scholarship of Rs. 10,000 each provided to 525 candidates registered and studying at the Manithaneyam Training Center for the Group-1 Main Examination.

title: Group-1 Main Exam Results: 24 Candidates from Manithaneyam Succeed
excerpt: 24 people who studied at Manithaneyam Training Center succeeded in the Group-1 Main Exam. 10 women and 14 men were successful.

title: Government Assistant Criminal Lawyer Preliminary Exam: 34 Candidates Succeed
excerpt: 34 students who attended training classes conducted jointly by the Bar Council and Manithaneya Maiyam have passed the first-stage examination for Government Assistant Criminal Lawyer posts.

title: AIADMK Foundation Day: Saidai Duraisamy's Speech on M.G.R.'s Legacy
excerpt: Former Chennai Mayor Saidai Duraisamy writes about the formation of AIADMK on October 17, 1972, and M.G.R.'s principles of honest service politics.

title: Civil and District Judge Preliminary Exam: Free Training Offered
excerpt: Manithaneya Maiyam Charitable Trust, in association with the Tamil Nadu and Puducherry Bar Councils, is conducting free training classes for the preliminary examination for civil and district judge positions.

title: UPSC Preliminary Exam: 71 Students from Manithaneyam Succeed
excerpt: Out of those who trained at the Manithaneyam IAS Free Education Centre, 57 male students and 14 female students, totaling 71 people, have cleared the UPSC preliminary exam.

title: UPSC Candidates Receive Financial Assistance from Manithaneyam
excerpt: Saidai Duraisamy's Manithaneya Charitable Trust provided financial aid to over 340 candidates who wrote the UPSC preliminary examination. Each candidate received 15,000 rupees.

title: Group-4 Exam Results: 232 Candidates from Manithaneyam Score High Marks
excerpt: Over 232 students who trained through the Manithaneya Charitable Trust scored high marks and have a chance to secure jobs through reservation in the Group-4 exam.

title: Group-1 Candidates: Speech on Honest Officers with Humanitarian Values
excerpt: Saidai Duraisamy addresses Group-1 candidates, emphasizing the need for honest officers without corruption, with humanitarian thoughts and qualities.

title: UPSC Main Exam Candidates Receive Financial Assistance
excerpt: Retired Police Head Alexander and Saidai Duraisamy each provided 15,000 rupees to 340 candidates who qualified for the UPSC main exam.

title: Civil and District Judge Training: Free Coaching Classes Announced
excerpt: Manithaneyam IAS Free Education Academy will provide free coaching for the preliminary exams of Civil Judge (TNPSC) and District Judge (High Court).

title: AMET University Foundation Day: 83 Teachers Honored
excerpt: Chennai's former Mayor Saidai Duraisamy, the special guest, honored 83 excellent teachers from government and private schools across Tamil Nadu at AMET University's 32nd Foundation Day.

title: M.G.R. Self-Financing College Scheme: Saidai Duraisamy's Speech
excerpt: M.G.R.'s self-financing college scheme paved the way for rural students to study. Saidai Duraisamy speaks about M.G.R.'s principles and honest service politics.

title: Group-1 Main Exam Training: Free Coaching with Incentive
excerpt: Coaching for the main examination will be provided with an incentive for those who passed the TNPSC Group-1 preliminary examination, announced Manithaneyam IAS Free Education Academy.
